sentences.en: A powerful one - step disinfectant cleaner for floor. Prevents mold and mildew.
sentences.cn: 一次过发挥清洁、消毒及辟味三种功能, 有助防止霉菌及细菌滋生.

sentences.en: After washing their hands thoroughly, visitors walk through a pool of disinfectant and then into the plant itself.
sentences.cn: 接下来，把手仔细洗过一遍之后，访客要穿过一个消毒池，最后进入厂房。

sentences.en: Alcohol may be a medical disinfectant,but should not be relied upon to sterilize water.
sentences.cn: 酒精可能是医学上的消毒剂，但决不可用来消毒饮用水。

sentences.en: Anney dabbed the cut with disinfectant and taped a gauze square over it.
sentences.cn: 安妮用消毒剂轻涂伤口,接着又贴上一块方纱布.

sentences.en: Cow dung is traditionally used as a fuel and disinfectant in villages, while cow urine and dung are often consumed in rituals to "purify" those on the bottom rungs of the Hindu caste system.
sentences.cn: 在农村，牛粪是传统燃料和消毒剂，而牛尿和牛粪往往用在“净化”仪式上，目的是“净化”那些处于印度教等级制度最底层的教徒们。

sentences.en: Dip your injured finger in the disinfectant to soak out the poison.
sentences.cn: 把你受伤的手指浸在消毒剂里,把毒浸泡出来.

sentences.en: Effluent from the sedimentation tank is dosed with disinfectant to kill any harmful organisms.
sentences.cn: 沉降池中的废水中加入了消毒剂，以消灭所有有害微生物。

sentences.en: More lime was then thrown over and it was sprayed with disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 随后撒上更多的石灰,并喷洒消毒剂.

sentences.en: Please wash the dishes with the soapy water containing disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 请用含消毒剂的肥皂水洗盘子.

sentences.en: Seeping through the squalid air of the police station, the sour smell of dirt and disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 渗透警察所污浊的空气, 就是那种污垢和消毒水剂混合的酸味.

sentences.en: Soap left on the surface for ten minutes work as a disinfectant.
sentences.cn: (作业一)将肥皂涂于表面十分钟后可以起到消毒剂的效用.

sentences.en: Spray the outer surface of the bag with disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 用消毒液喷洒在塑料袋表面.

sentences.en: The doctor distilled a few drops of disinfectant onto the wound.
sentences.cn: 医生往伤口上撒了些消毒剂.

sentences.en: The nurse bathed the wound with disinfectant water.
sentences.cn: 护士用消毒水冲洗伤口.

sentences.en: Use disinfectant spray to clean flaps of UM vehicles and bus daily.
sentences.cn: 每天用喷洒消毒剂清洁澳大交通工具的泠气出风口.

sentences.en: Wipe down door knobs , keyboards, telephones, etc with disinfectant frequently.
sentences.cn: 要经常用消毒剂将门把手 、 键盘 、 电话等擦拭干净.

trans.tran_en: a chemical or a cleaning product that destroys  bacteria
